name: Indigenous
description:
THE GAME

LORE

Indigenous is a virtual reality game for the HTC Vive set in a post ice age environment. You play as the first generation of this new age. As snow melts and glaciers break you feel your connection to the earth getting stronger. Out of the snow arise ruins from structures build by the Indigenous, a generation that lived before the ice-age. Upon discovering these ruins, you learn about the bizarre powers that these indigenous had. Drawings of people controlling earth with what seems to be their mind.

With your travels you discover a training ground, used by the Indigenous to train their abilities.

GAMEPLAY

The full game will include online PvP battle against other Vive users. Players will level up and earn rewards for defeating their opponents. This demo contains offline gameplay that demonstrates the game's mechanics. The main mechanic is manipulating the earth element using physical movements. We focused on making this system dynamic as possible to allow for different moves and combinations.

DEMO

This is not a full release of the game "Indigenous".  While this game is still being developed, we decided to offer this demo to see the amount of interest in what we are building.
